document.masterDocTitle: Fifteen new species of Sathytes Westwood from China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae), with an updated checklist of world species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Fifteen new species of Sathytes Westwood from China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae), with an updated checklist of world species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Laboratory of Systematic Entomology, College of Life Sciences, Shanghai Normal University, 100 Guilin Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai 200234, China.
Laboratory of Systematic Entomology, College of Life Sciences, Shanghai Normal University, 100 Guilin Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai 200234, China.

subSubSection.paragraph: (57 spp. in Palaearctic and Oriental regions)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

. Type species:

(by original monotypy).

). Type species:
